get.summary: Retrieves the subscribed alerts details for an arrangement

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: subscribe
parameters.description: Enables an alert service

parameters.name: alertRequestId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the alert request

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the eligible alerts available for the account
get.description: Retrieves eligible alerts for the account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves alert requests for external subscriptions.
get.description: Retrieves alert request details for external subscriptions such as the external customer identifier, contract reference and external user identifier.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Event identifier

parameters.name: contractReference
parameters.description: Contains the contract reference

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: externalUserId
parameters.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created

parameters.name: externalCustomerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the external customer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

subscriptionLevel.description: Extra filtering and validation at the subscription level to indicate if this event can be subscribed by a customer or department or both.  If defined as GLOBAL, then the customer cannot subscribe or un-subscribe to this event.  Allowed values: - INTERNAL - EXTERNAL - BOTH - GLOBAL
